examples.full_description: working with arrays instantiating #array_with_two_elements returns an array that has 2 objects in it

examples.description: takes in an argument of an array and returns the first element in the array using its positive index
examples.full_description: working with arrays indexing #first_element takes in an argument of an array and returns the first element in the array using its positive index

examples.description: takes in an argument of an array and returns the third element in the array using its positive index

examples.description: takes in an argument of an array and returns the first element in the array, without referencing the index number of that element
